EmailTemplate.description: Request customers to upload a gift agreement if they are requesting custom racks
EmailTemplate.name: Request for Gift Agreement for Custom Racks
EmailTemplate.subject: Gift Agreement for Custom Rack Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
You have requested a custom bike rack. For applications with custom rack requests, we do require a Gift Agreement to be uploaded. Please upload your Gift Agreement in the Attachments section of your case. Once all materials are received and approved to move forward, the request will proceed in the application process.
To view your online request, follow the link provided below: {!Case.Link}
Thank you,
San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
